Package controller

Class AddNewAppointmentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AddNewAppointmentController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommonUseHelperIfc, javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class AddNewAppointmentController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, CommonUseHelperIfc
    This class provides a data control flow between the add new appointment view and database tables

      • areValidInput

        private boolean areValidInput​(java.lang.String type,
                              java.lang.String location,
                              java.lang.String title,
                              java.lang.String description,
                              java.time.LocalDate startD,
                              java.lang.String startH,
                              java.lang.String startM,
                              java.time.LocalDate endD,
                              java.lang.String endH,
                              java.lang.String endM,
                              java.lang.String contact,
                              java.lang.String customer,
                              java.lang.String user)
        Validates user input by checking the input can not be null or whether meet certain requirements.
        Parameters:
        title - title field input.
        description - description field input.
        type - type field input.
        location - location field input.
        startD - start date field input.
        startH - start hour field input.
        startM - start minute field input.
        endD - end date field input.
        endH - end hour field input.
        endM - end minute field input.
        contact - contact name.
        customer - customer name
        user - user name
        Returns:
        boolean not valid returns a false, otherwise returns a true.

      • convertContactListToIDNamePair

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,​java.lang.String> convertContactListToIDNamePair()
        Lambda expression #1: Convert a list of contact object into a contact ID and contact Name key value pair map. This is a faster and cleaner way to write code instead of using traditional loops.
        Returns:
        a map that contains only contact ID and its corresponding contact name
